PropertyList.title: McDonnell Douglas MD-11 Help
PropertyList.text:
Available documentation can be viewed in the "Documentation" menu.
2D versions of certain cockpit panels are included to make certain tasks easier. These can be opened from the "2D Panels" menu.
The Aircraft Config Center can be used to load panel states as well as configure aircraft and ground equipment.
Aircraft Config Center Options: * Keyboard Mode: Maps flight controls to number pad and number rows instead of view shortucts. * IRS Aligns Instantly: Skips the ~10 minute alignment process of the IRS. * 8.33KHz Radio Equipped: Equips the COMM radios with the new 8.33KHz VHF frequency spacing. * IESI Equipped: Equips the aircraft with a digital standby instrument instead of the mechanical gauges. * RCWS Equipped: Equips the aircraft with the optional Roll Control Wheel Steering system. * Deflected Ailerons Equipped (PIP): Equips the aircraft with the deflected ailerons system. * Use Separate Tiller Axis: Separates the tiller from the rudder and maps it to /controls/gear/steering * ATS Override: Configures whether the autothrottle can be overriden by the pilot when in Clamp.
